bulletPoints.content: Led worldwide profitability analysis initiatives, enhancing data-driven decision-making and contributing to a 5% operational profit turnaround.
Streamlined financial processes through automation, reducing monthly workload by 4 days and improving operational efficiency, showcasing a strong data-driven mindset.
